sig_info: Brock Rumlow’s brutal Hydra Training allows him a 35 to 62.98% chance to Purify incoming Debuffs. Each time he does so, he gains a Fury Buff. Chance temporarily decreases for consecutive triggers.

Duckslug Editorial
The chance is decreased 20% for 3 seconds after each activation. Even Bro☠️ 🥃low's brutal Hydra Training cannot purify more than 5 Debuffs in 3 seconds.

PERSONAL FURY BUFFS: Unless otherwise stated, Crossbones’ Fury Buffs grant +38.7 Attack Rating for 9 seconds. These Fury Buffs gain increased Potency equal to 20% of Crossbones’s Critical Damage Multiplier.
CRITICAL HIT REPLACEMENT: Crossbones’ hydraulic gauntlets prevent him from landing Critical Hits. Whenever he would land one, he instead gains a Fury Buff.
CONTEMPT FOR HEROES: While fighting #Hero Champions, Crossbones’ abilities gain special bonuses.
ALL ATTACKS: Reduce the opponent’s Defensive Ability Accuracy by 20% for each Fury Buff active. Reduction becomes 25% instead.
OVERRUN - DASH BACK AND HOLD BLOCK FOR 1: Once activated, Overrun remains active for 12 seconds, after which it must go on cooldown for 8 seconds.
On Activation: Refresh the duration of all Personal Fury Buffs and gain 2 new ones. Gain an additional Fury Buff.
While Active: Hits on the opponent ignore positive Physical Resistance and gain +50% Combat Power Rate.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Spend 1 Fury Buff to Pause all remaining Fury Buffs for 5 seconds. If this attack Intercepts the opponent or strikes them while they are recovering from a Special Attack, it does not cost a Fury Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff.
Gain 2 an additional Fury Buff(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This attack Incinerates the enemy, dealing 86 Energy Damage over 8 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
Inflict an additional Incinerate Debuff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to gain a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by +533.33 for 40 seconds.
Precision Buff becomes Passive and lasts 70 seconds.

Duckslug Editorial
The chance is decreased 20% for 3 seconds after each activation. Even Bro☠️ 🥃low's brutal Hydra Training cannot purify more than 5 Debuffs in 3 seconds.

PERSONAL FURY BUFFS: Unless otherwise stated, Crossbones’ Fury Buffs grant +796.95 Attack Rating for 9 seconds. These Fury Buffs gain increased Potency equal to 20% of Crossbones’s Critical Damage Multiplier.
CRITICAL HIT REPLACEMENT: Crossbones’ hydraulic gauntlets prevent him from landing Critical Hits. Whenever he would land one, he instead gains a Fury Buff.
CONTEMPT FOR HEROES: While fighting #Hero Champions, Crossbones’ abilities gain special bonuses.
ALL ATTACKS: Reduce the opponent’s Defensive Ability Accuracy by 20% for each Fury Buff active. Reduction becomes 25% instead.
OVERRUN - DASH BACK AND HOLD BLOCK FOR 1: Once activated, Overrun remains active for 12 seconds, after which it must go on cooldown for 8 seconds.
On Activation: Refresh the duration of all Personal Fury Buffs and gain 2 new ones. Gain an additional Fury Buff.
While Active: Hits on the opponent ignore positive Physical Resistance and gain +50% Combat Power Rate.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Spend 1 Fury Buff to Pause all remaining Fury Buffs for 5 seconds. If this attack Intercepts the opponent or strikes them while they are recovering from a Special Attack, it does not cost a Fury Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff.
Gain 2 an additional Fury Buff(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: This attack Incinerates the enemy, dealing 1771 Energy Damage over 8 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
Inflict an additional Incinerate Debuff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to gain a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by +683.33 for 40 seconds.
Precision Buff becomes Passive and lasts 70 seconds.
